title: I'm using gboard and system auto has two options: black (light mode) and gray (night mode).
content: I am using Gboard and the keyboard does not have a white option under system Auto. The only two options I have are black and gray and they switch between those two when I go from light mode to dark mode. Is there any way to reset the options so I can have a white keyboard during the day and a black keyboard at night?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
